content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the court case involved the division of assets of a deceased person including real estate a car a motorbike funds in a bank account unpaid pension benefits and shares in a company the assets have a total value of 200000 eur and will be split between the deceased persons widow and granddaughter the court fees amount to 86400 eur which will be shared by the heirs the procedure lasted for 10 months and the court made the final decision based on the inheritance act specifically article 11 the courts decision will be registered with the land registry and the heirs will take possession of the assets through a final order of succession if any party wishes to appeal the decision they must do so within 15 days and submit the appeal to the court with the necessary copies the ljubljana high court will then decide on the appeal

metadata.cost: 864,00 EUR court fees shared by heirs
metadata.subject_of_succession: real estates, car skoda Fabia Combi, motor bike Honda QQ, funds on personal bank account, unpaid pension benefits, 4 shares of the company
